Data Science For Social Good

Cooper Brewing

Generative Machine Learning for Architecture, Spring 2022

We concluded our final reviews for Generative Machine Learning for Architecture in the Houghton gallery. Check out the images and videos below.

Apollonian Gasket

This project explores a novel architectural structure using a circle packing algorithm, the Apollonian Gasket, to create an installation and lighting concept.

Team: Joshua Hsu (Arch), Sean Lee (Arch), Alexa Jakob (Eng), Alsu Flare (Eng)

String Screen

A three-dimensional screen uses video projection on strings to create an image that can be walked through.

Team: Rhyna Chen (Arch), Michael Sluchevsky (Arch), River Friedman (Art), Allister Liu (Eng), Victor Zhang (Eng)

Mazes

3D Maze algorithms used to generate architectural prototypes.

Team: Earl Kwofie (Arch), Min Cheng (Eng), Seyun Kim (Eng)

Miscellaneous

Miscellaneous other projects
